response.overview: After their daily school day session, the two girls decided to do their daily prayers in the library but turns out one of them accidentally fell asleep instead. But when she woke up, she notices that her friend is already undergoing the prayer without her, leaving her behind as she slowly waking up from her nap. She then later joins the prayer behind her friend, but soon enough she felt uneasy about the whole situation.
response.title: Humuq; Jangan Tidur Sore
